subject: Olympic Games
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Emil Zatopek won gold in the 1948 London Games, where he bought two gold rings for his fiancée, Dana Zatopkova, who finished seventh in the javelin.
snippet: Emil Zatopek won gold in the 1948 London Games, where he bought two gold rings for his fiancée, Dana Zatopkova, who finished seventh in the javelin.
